name: HueShark
description:
HueShark tells the story of two couples (Father, Mother, Son and daughter in law) who make a business of the trip which provide services to be excellent employees. All specialize in engineering and knowledgeable mechanics and technology. To go with a yacht for sea (yacht leased by the company) they suffer from the excesses of the sea, amidst the trip a strong storm hits the yacht they are and they are driven by the strong current. The ship just stopped on a deserted island, with its engine and electrical destroyed.
The group thinks about how to survive and how to return home and the way out of this was to place a fishing vessel that was also on the island anchored very close to the island and trying to fix the engine / radio this new boat that found the island to work and thus be recovered or go home. Mysteriously the fishing boat had some skeletons and brand "chifradas" on the hull.
Although still in good condition generated curiosity to the crew member with effort managed to take the boat right next to the island and anchor it there. Their idea was to go to the island whenever possible in a boat to pick up food supplies and seek to help the group survive.
Below is a description InGame ...

A challenging game that makes the player has full attention to the status of each player and the bag with ship resources. Mind Nutrition, Humor and fatigue of each character to prevent them from working with penalties in the handling and assignment due time.
Fish, create trap for HueShark, keep the fish tank always filled to avoid damage to the ship.
Rains occur continuously to renew the boat's water reserve.

Try "hook" seagulls to create traps for sharks (yes, seagulls + glass + = putrefaction stomachache in HueShark) ...

There are three ways to win:

1 - Spend maximum supplies (supplies) in the engine and you will win the game going home with the new engine,
2 - Spend maximum supplies (supplies) on the radio and you win the game being rescued by a Navy helicopter,
3 - Go as many times as possible to the island and use the flag to attract the coast guard and you will be saved by a Navy helicopter.
Thank you for enjoying our game, it's FREE and it's an honor for us to share our efforts with you.
